reviews.text: I have read the other negative reviews of the hotel, and no doubt they used to be true, but they have opened a newly renovated wing that is brand new, and just as nice as any top US or Western hotel. The location is a 10 minute walk to the Black Church.
reviews.title: The modern wing of the hotel is fabulous
Beautiful place, terrible hotel
reviews.text: I would make sure you get a room in the new wing. I know they will renovate the old part of the hotel but who knows how long that will be.

reviews.title: Memorably Quirky and Worth a Visit
reviews.text: Never, never, never stay in a government hotel in Romania: they are incredibly dirty and really overpriced. You pay about 120 $ for a horrible room with a never cleaned small bathroom.

reviews.title: Welcome to 1980.
reviews.text: For half the price you can now find in Brasov some private hotels with new furniture, magnificent wood floor and modern big and clean bathroom.
